name: tntjs
description: TNT.js is a Javascript-based programming language. It's our goal to make it as simple as Python, and at the same time make it looks like a front-end programming language. The language avoid the cons of TypeScript that can't run directly on the browser.

scripts.build: tsc  && javascript-obfuscator tnt.js --output tnt.min.js --string-array-encoding 'rc4' && rm tnt.js

author: 27Onion, Bugduck
